data.name: Behind the Art and Magic of Chicken Police
data.detailed_description:
How long did it take for this idea to hatch? How did they make these weird characters? How do you build a world as deep and rich in detail? Take a deep dive Behind the Art and Magic of Chicken Police and meet the people behind the visual style that makes Chicken Police so unique.

The Wild Gentlemen will share impressions of their journey to Clawville and beyond! It’s been a clucking wild ride, thanks for coming along!

data.short_description: How long did it take for this idea to hatch? How did they make these weird characters? How do you build a world as deep and rich in detail? Take a deep dive Behind the Art and Magic of Chicken Police and meet the people behind the visual style that makes Chicken Police so unique.

content_descriptors.notes: Some of the pictures might be disturbing to a young audience due to the fright, visual partial nudity, tobacco and alcohol abuse.
